channel.title: Projects on Taegyun Jeon
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Taegyun Jeon

item.title: Living Energy: distributed-intelligence management and operation for smart energy
item.description:
Sponsor: Gwangu Institute of Science and Technology (GIST)

Period: 1⁄2016 - 12⁄2017

Tasks:

  • Develop perversive demand response (DR) based on Big Data analytics.
  • Optimize electricity load forecasting with energy patterns and factor diversification.
  • Drive a long-term analysis and reporting based on load forecasting and electricity consumptions.

Description and contributions

In this project, I show how deep learning can be used to optimize electricity load forecasting. I introduce a short descriptions of the model, which serves both as a refresher but also as to anchor the notation and show how mathematical expressions are mapped onto TensorFlow graph.

Knowledge and Skills

python, TensorFlow, Recurrent Neural Networks, Load Forecasting

item.title: Digit Recognizer using Convolutional Neural Networks for MNIST dataset
item.description:
Sponsor: Individual project

Period: May, 2016

Task: Classification of images of handwritten single digit.

Description and contributions

In this individual project, I show how TensorFlow can be used to implement the Convolutional Neural Networks. I introduce a short descriptions of the model, which serves both as a refresher but also as to anchor the notation and show how mathematical expressions are mapped onto TensorFlow graph. Detail explanations are on the project page.

Knowledge and Skills

python, TensorFlow, Convolutional Neural Networks, Digit Recognition
